bio:
Gralnach is a Nord child who lives at Heartwood Mill with his mother Grosta, located in The Rift. His father is Leifnarr, who has gone missing.
Upon meeting him, he will ask the Dragonborn to play a game with him, either Tag or Hide-and-Seek.
If his mother dies, he will say, "I can't believe my mother's gone. Now what'll I do?". In turn, he will be sent to Honorhall Orphanage after her death, after which he will be available for adoption.
name: Gralnach
